metadata.title: CVE-2020-8124 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient validation and sanitization of user input exists in url-parsenpm package version 1.4.4 and earlier may allow attacker to bypass securitychecks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8124` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.4.7-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-3').
